content.rendered:
Introducing Alina, our expert stylist hailing from Sweden, bringing a touch of Scandinavian sophistication to Luxe Concept Salon. With a focus on blondes and cutting-edge coloring techniques, Alina crafts effortlessly chic looks tailored to each client.

From vibrant hues to subtle highlights, her mastery of modern coloration is unmatched. Complemented by her flair for contemporary cutting and styling, Alina ensures every client leaves feeling empowered and transformed. Experience the epitome of luxury and sophistication with Alina at Luxe Concept Salon.

Availability: Monday, Wednesday, Thursday & Friday.

excerpt.rendered: Introducing Alina, our expert stylist hailing from Sweden, bringing a touch of Scandinavian sophistication to Luxe Concept Salon.
